page.title: 16My village Ashford Carbonell
page.content: In Ashford there are different things to do.You go to school Monday to Friday,9.00a.m. to 3.30p.m.There's a playing field with a Rounders pitch, a Cricket pitch, a running track, Tennis court and swings.The school goes swimming every Friday at Ludlow swimming pool. Ashford is allright but it has its bad points as well as its good points.For instance,cars drive too fast through the village,there is only a path on one side of the road, and eventually the road comes to a dead end.The good things are the school which is nice and does lots of interesting things,the playing field which might get new playing things,and there are lots of nice children to play with.
